_sText:
de_hardrock_cafe - Bomb-Defuse by Silly

It all started when the terrorists got pissed because the band that was supposed to play was running late. So instead of asking for a refund on the concert tickets they try to blow the place up.
Bomb sites are in the parking garage and in the center of the hotel. 

Counter Terrorists: defuse the bomb and/or neutralize the terrorists

======================================

Authors: Silly 

Silly's email noobsonly@optonline.net




=======================================
LEVEL DESCRIPTION: 

This is not a copy of a real place,
It just kind of evolved into what it is.
Lots of pretty textures and some really nice models.
Some music with a catchy beat.
A very fast playing level.
secret room between elevators in the mall.
This map is smaller then the first version de_hardrock_cafe_b1
=======================================
CONSTRUCTION:

base map:     		de_hardrock_cafe (Original)          		 
editor used:            Source Hammer and Source SDK tools
utilities used:        	photoshop 6.0 XnView vtf edit gcf scape	
known bugs:            	none at time of release

compile machine:     	Intel core2 3.0 GHz  with 3GB DDR RAM Win7
compile time:           7 minutes total (full/final)
total build time        390 hours
=======================================================
INSTALLATION:

Unzip de_hardrock_cafe.zip (there should be three files).

Place the de_hardrock_cafe.bsp, de_hardrock_cafe.nav and de_hardrock_cafe.txt in 
your cstrike\maps folder, typically:

C:\Program files\Steam\SteamApps\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\

=======================================================
OTHER LEVELS BY Silly:

de_caspacio, cs_officeparty, de_hardrock_cafe_b1, Cs Office_xmasparty

Enjoy and have a safe day!

Silly
